item.title: SEO Plugin - WordPress Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 8.2.Â WordPress SEO Plugin In the previous section, we learned some of the important SEO recommendations to improve page rank. In this section, we put those recommendations into action with the help of WordPress SEO Plugin. WordPress SEO Plugin by Yoast is one the leading search engine optimization (SEO) plugins for WordPress. WordPress SEO Plugin helps us to: Set SEO Title for the page. Set Meta Description for the page.
